sqls.sql: SELECT tool_status, tool_no, tool_name, factory_no, tool_type1, tool_type2, tool_type3, tool_type4, tool_type5, tool_type6, tool_type7, tool_type8, tool_type9, tool_type10, tool_spec1_txt, tool_spec1_min, tool_spec1_max, tool_spec2_txt, tool_spec2_min, tool_spec2_max, tool_spec3_txt, tool_spec3_min, tool_spec3_max, tool_spec4_txt, tool_spec4_min, tool_spec4_max, tool_sort, tool_color, tool_height, tool_total_qty, tool_valid_qty, tool_unit, tool_eff_n, tool_eff_d, wkt_before_c, wkt_after_c, wkt_produce_c, qty_produce_c, wkt_worker_c, wkc_worker_num_c, wkt_before_b, wkt_after_b, wkt_produce_b, qty_produce_b, wkt_worker_b, wkc_worker_num_b, wkt_before_a, wkt_after_a, wkt_produce_a, qty_produce_a, wkt_worker_a, wkc_worker_num_a, wkt_max_wait_minute, cost_produce_c, cost_before_c, cost_after_c, cost_idle_c, tool_rmk01, tool_rmk02, tool_rmk03, tool_rmk04, tool_rmk05, tool_rmk06, tool_rmk07, tool_rmk08, tool_rmk09, tool_rmk10, tool_lifetime_hope, tool_lifetime_start, tool_lifetime_add, tool_lifetime_real, tool_lifetime_used, tool_cycle_lifetime_used, tool_cycle_days_warning, tool_cycle_lifetime_warning, tool_cycle_days_maintain, tool_cycle_lifetime_maintain, tool_lifetime_add_cfm_time, tool_lifetime_add_cfm_worker, tool_maintain_date_last, tool_maintain_date_next, tool_mtr_rate, tool_used_status, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, invp_no FROM tool WHERE tool_no = @tool_no OR tool_id = @tool_id;
DELETE FROM tool WHERE tool_no = @tool_no OR tool_id = @tool_id;
